statements: SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE in_stock = TRUE;
SELECT product_name, product_description FROM products WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 20.00 AND 80.00 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC, price ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE in_stock = TRUE;
SELECT product_name, product_description FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 20 AND 100 AND in_stock = TRUE;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE id = 1;
SELECT description, name, price FROM products WHERE price >= 100;
SELECT name, price, description FROM products WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT id, name, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 200;
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT * FROM products WHERE name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT id, name, description FROM products JOIN categories ON products.id = categories.product_id ORDER BY products.name ASC
SELECT id, name, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 200
SELECT * FROM products INNER JOIN categories ON products.id = categories.product_id
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT product_name, description FROM products WHERE product_id = 3;
SELECT category_name FROM categories ORDER BY category_name DESC;

SELECT product_name, price, category_name FROM products JOIN product_categories ON products.product_id = product_categories.product_id JOIN categories ON product_categories.category_id = categories.category_id WHERE categories.category_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%' AND price < 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT product_name, description FROM products JOIN product_categories ON products.product_id = product_categories.product_id WHERE product_categories.category_id = 1;

SELECT product_name, description, category_name FROM products JOIN product_categories ON products.product_id = product_categories.product_id JOIN categories ON product_categories.category_id = categories.category_id;

SELECT category_name, COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM categories JOIN product_categories ON categories.category_id = product_categories.category_id GROUP BY category_name HAVING COUNT(product_id) > 5;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, name, description FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT p.name AS product_name, c.name AS category_name FROM products p JOIN product_categories pc ON p.id = pc.product_id JOIN categories c ON pc.category_id = c.id;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE price < 50 OR name LIKE '%red%' ORDER BY price ASC;

SELECT p.name, c.name AS category FROM products p INNER JOIN product_categories pc ON p.id = pc.product_id INNER JOIN categories c ON pc.category_id = c.id WHERE c.name = 'electronics' ORDER BY p.price DESC;
SELECT p.name, COUNT(pi.id) AS image_count FROM products p LEFT JOIN product_images pi ON p.id = pi.product_id GROUP BY p.id HAVING image_count > 0;
SELECT name, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM products GROUP BY name HAVING AVG(price) > 50 ORDER BY avg_price DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT product_id, name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT category_id, name FROM categories WHERE category_id < 5;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 20 AND 50 ORDER BY price ASC;

SELECT products.name, categories.name FROM products JOIN product_categories ON products.product_id = product_categories.product_id JOIN categories ON product_categories.category_id = categories.category_id;
SELECT orders.order_id, users.username, orders.order_date FROM orders JOIN users ON orders.user_id = users.user_id WHERE users.username = 'john_doe';

SELECT categories.name, AVG(products.price) AS avg_price FROM categories JOIN product_categories ON categories.category_id = product_categories.category_id JOIN products ON product_categories.product_id = products.product_id GROUP BY categories.name HAVING AVG(products.price) > 30;
